name: .BTN File Extension
summary: Learn about .BTN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Button file used by AutoPlay Media Studio, a rapid application development tool used to create CD menus, games, and multimedia applications; stores the button styles and can specify a scripted action to take when the button is clicked.

content: BTN files store buttons that can be included in AutoPlay Media Studio applications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
